pli-tv-kd7:1.1.2: pāveyyakā → pāṭheyyakā (bj, s1-3, pts1) | āraññikā → āraññakā (bj, s1-3, pts1)
pli-tv-kd7:1.5.2: Kathañca pana, bhikkhave → kathañca bhikkhave (bj, s1-3, pts1)
pli-tv-kd7:1.5.8: na ovaṭṭiyakaraṇamattena → na ovaṭṭikaraṇamattena (bj); na ovaṭṭikakaraṇamattena (s1-3, pts1); na ovadeyyakaraṇamattena (mr)
pli-tv-kd7:1.5.9: na kaṇḍusakaraṇamattena → na kaṇḍasakaraṇamattena (s1-3); na gaṇḍusakaraṇamattena (mr)
pli-tv-kd7:1.5.13: na ovaddheyyakaraṇamattena → na ovaṭṭeyyakaraṇamattena (bj, s1-3); na ovadeyyakaraṇamattena (mr)
pli-tv-kd7:3.2.24: Samādāyasattakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ → ādāyasattakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ (pts1); … dutiyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ (mr)
pli-tv-kd7:13.2.93: vippakate → vippakatā (bj, pts1, mr) | chakke → chaṭṭhe (si); chaccā (pts1, mr)
pli-tv-kd7:13.2.120: Apavilānā navettha → apavinā nava cettha (bj); apavilāyamāneva (s1-3); apacinanā navettha (pts1)
